canstorex.pagedata
Class PageUtil

java.lang.Object
  canstorex.pagedata.PageUtil

public class PageUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements helper methods related with page operations.

Author:
Daniel Patanroi

addParentPageLinker

public static void addParentPageLinker(long pageID,
                                       int nodeOffset)
                                throws java.io.IOException
This method adds parent page information on the rootFony of this page, which is the first node on the page.

Parameters:
pageID - Page ID of parent page of this page.
nodeOffset - Node offset in the parent page, for locating parent node of rootFony node in this page.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

ByteAddressUpper

                                   int nodeSize)
This method calculates byte address for upper part.

Parameters:
nodeOffset - Node offset, zerobased start from top.
nodeSize - Size of a node within a page.
Returns:
Byte address within a page.

makeXML

public static java.lang.String makeXML(java.io.PrintWriter p,
                                       storagemanager.StorageManagerClient xmlClient,
                                       int pageID,
                                       int nodeOffset,
                                       java.lang.String str)
                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                       java.io.IOException
This method creates xml file on specified print writer using XML Client. This method is the same with the previous, except that it only writes for every number of bytes. It turns out String processing overhead is much higher than writing it directly.

Parameters:
p - Print writer acts as output file.
xmlClient - XML Client.
pageID - Starting pageID
nodeOffset - Starting node offset.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

printIndexedElements

public static void printIndexedElements(int pageID,
                                        java.lang.String keyword,
                                        boolean inPageElementsOnly)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        java.io.IOException
This method finds and prints out all the elements found by the keyword in the given root page. (The keyword must have been indexed in the BXML document) The purpose of this method is to help evaluate the number of page accesses of our index strategy.

Parameters:
pageID - The page ID of the root page of the BXML document
keyword - the keyword in the index
inPageElementsOnly - - true: only print the elements inside the root page; false: print all the elements in the subtree started by the root page.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

                                       java.lang.String keyword,
                                       boolean inPageElementsOnly)
                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                       java.io.IOException
This method counts the number of elements found by the keyword in the given root page. (The keyword must have been indexed in the BXML document)

Parameters:
pageID -
keyword -
inPageElementsOnly -
Returns:
the number of elements found
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

Parameters:
p - Print writer acts as output file.
Start - Tag whether start tag used.
pageID - Starting pageID
nodeOffset - Starting node offset.
